00016 PROGRAM merge_orbitals
00017 use strings
00018 use m_mrgrnk
00019 implicit none
00020 
00021 character(len=20) :: FMT, a_ch, b_ch, c_ch, d_ch, e_ch, nul
00022 integer bla
00023 character(len=20), external :: modnum
00024 character*20 out(6)
00025 integer nseg
00026 
00027 real*8 a,b,c,d,e
00028 real*8, allocatable :: molb(:), merged_orbitals(:,:), merged_energies(:)
00029 
00030 integer n_basis_a, n_lines_a, n_rest_a
00031 integer n_basis_b, n_lines_b, n_rest_b
00032 integer n_orbitals_a, n_orbitals_b, n_basis, n_orbitals
00033 integer, allocatable :: rank(:)
00034 integer i,j, cnt
00035 CHARACTER*100 LINEARG  ,fileA, pathname, fileB, fileC, buf
00036 CHARACTER*2 CP
00037 
00038 ! prepare NULL
00039 nul = modnum(0.0d0)
00040 
00041 ! number of basis functions and orbitals read from command line
00042 CALL getarg(1,LINEARG)
00043 READ(LINEARG,*) n_basis_a
00044 CALL getarg(2,LINEARG)
00045 READ(LINEARG,*) n_orbitals_a
00046 CALL getarg(3,LINEARG)
00047 READ(LINEARG,*) n_basis_b
00048 CALL getarg(4,LINEARG)
00049 READ(LINEARG,*) n_orbitals_b
00050 CALL getarg(5,LINEARG)
00051 READ(LINEARG,*) pathname
00052 CALL getarg(6,LINEARG)
00053 READ(LINEARG,*) CP
00054 
00055 CP=trim(CP)
00056 
00057 fileA=trim(trim(pathname)//'/molA/fort.7')
00058 fileB=trim(trim(pathname)//'/molB/fort.7')
00059 fileC=trim(trim(pathname)//'/dim/dimer.com')
00060 
00061 n_orbitals = n_orbitals_a + n_orbitals_b
00062 if ( CP .eq. "CP") then
00063    n_basis = n_basis_a
00064 else
00065    n_basis    = n_basis_a + n_basis_b
00066 end if
00067 
00068 ! read orbitals into matrix
00069 allocate( merged_orbitals(n_orbitals,n_basis),merged_energies(n_orbitals) )
00070 allocate(rank(n_orbitals))
00071 merged_orbitals = 0.0d0
00072 merged_energies = 0.0d0
00073 
00074 ! how many basis function lines for molecule A
00075 n_lines_a    = n_basis_a/5
00076 n_rest_a     = n_basis_a - 5*n_lines_a
00077 !if (n_rest_a .ne. 0) then
00078 !   n_basis_b  = n_basis_b - (5-n_rest_a)
00079 !end if
00080 n_lines_b  = n_basis_b/5
00081 n_rest_b   = n_basis_b - 5*n_lines_b
00082 
00083 write(*,*) 'basis per mol:', n_basis_a
00084 write(*,*) 'lines from molA:', n_lines_a
00085 write(*,*) 'rest from molA:', n_rest_a
00086 write(*,*) ' basis molB:', n_basis_b
00087 write(*,*) ' lines molB:', n_lines_b
00088 write(*,*) ' rest molB:', n_rest_b
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 allocate( molB(n_basis))
00093 
00094 select case(CP)
00095             
00096    case DEFAULT
00097 
00098       ! read from molecule A
00099       open(8,file=fileA,status='old')
00100       open(9,file=fileC,status='old',position='append')
00101       read(8,'(A8)') FMT
00102       write(9,'(A8)') FMT
00103       do i = 1, n_orbitals_a
00104          read(8,"(a)") buf
00105          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00106          read(out(2),*) merged_energies(i)
00107          cnt =0
00108          do j = 1, n_lines_a
00109 
00110             read(8,FMT) merged_orbitals(i,cnt+1), &
00111                         merged_orbitals(i,cnt+2), &
00112                         merged_orbitals(i,cnt+3), &
00113                         merged_orbitals(i,cnt+4), &
00114                         merged_orbitals(i,cnt+5)
00115 
00116             cnt = cnt +5
00117          end do
00118          if (n_rest_a == 1) then
00119             read(8,'(1D15.8)') merged_orbitals(i,cnt+1)
00120          else if (n_rest_a == 2) then
00121             read(8,'(2D15.8)') merged_orbitals(i,cnt+1), &  
00122                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+2)
00123          else if (n_rest_a == 3) then
00124             read(8,'(3D15.8)') merged_orbitals(i,cnt+1), &
00125                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+2), &
00126                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+3)
00127          else if (n_rest_a == 4) then
00128             read(8,'(4D15.8)') merged_orbitals(i,cnt+1), &
00129                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+2), &
00130                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+3), &
00131                                merged_orbitals(i,cnt+4)
00132          end if
00133       end do
00134       close(8)
00135 
00136       ! now molecule B
00137       open(8,file=fileB,status='old')
00138 
00139       read(8,*) FMT
00140       do i = 1, n_orbitals_b
00141          read(8,"(a)") buf
00142          CALL PARSE(buf,'=',out,nseg)
00143          read(out(2),*) merged_energies(n_orbitals_a+i)
00144          cnt = n_basis_a
00145          do j = 1, n_lines_b
00146 
00147             read(8,FMT) merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+1), &
00148                         merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+2), &
00149                         merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+3), &
00150                         merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+4), &
00151                         merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+5)
00152 
00153             cnt = cnt +5
00154          end do
00155          if (n_rest_b == 1) then
00156             read(8,'(1D15.8)') merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+1)
00157          else if (n_rest_b == 2) then
00158             read(8,'(2D15.8)') merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+1), &  
00159                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+2)
00160          else if (n_rest_b == 3) then
00161             read(8,'(3D15.8)') merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+1), &
00162                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+2), &
00163                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+3)
00164          else if (n_rest_b == 4) then
00165             read(8,'(4D15.8)') merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+1), &
00166                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+2), &
00167                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+3), &
00168                                merged_orbitals(n_orbitals_a+i,cnt+4)
00169          end if
00170 
00171       end do
00172 
00173       close(8)
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177       CALL  mrgrnk (merged_energies, rank)                  
00178 
00179       do i = 1, n_orbitals
00180          write(9,'(I5,A,D15.8)') i," Alpha MO OE=", merged_energies(rank(i))
00181          write(9,FMT) merged_orbitals(rank(i),:)
00182       end do
00183       
00184       close(9)
00185 
00186    end select
00187 
00188 
00189 
00190 
00191  end PROGRAM merge_orbitals
00192 
00193 character(len=20) function modnum(x)
00194 implicit none
00195 real*8 x
00196 
00197 write(modnum,'(D15.8)') x
00198 modnum = adjustl(modnum)
00199 if (modnum(1:1) == '0') then
00200    modnum(1:1) = ' '
00201 else if (modnum(1:1) == '-') then
00202    if (modnum(2:2) == '0') then
00203       modnum(2:len(modnum)-1) = modnum(3:len(modnum))
00204    end if
00205 end if
00206 
00207 end function modnum

00263 !!$            e_ch = modnum(e)

00267 !!$            read(8,'(1D15.8)') a

00269 !!$            write(9,*) trim(a_ch)
00270 !!$         else if (n_rest == 2) then
00271 !!$            read(8,'(2D15.8)') a, b
00272 !!$            a_ch = modnum(a)
00273 !!$            b_ch = modnum(b)
00274 !!$            write(9,*) trim(a_ch),' ',trim(b_ch)
00275 !!$         else if (n_rest == 3) then
00276 !!$            read(8,'(3D15.8)') a, b, c
00277 !!$            a_ch = modnum(a)
00278 !!$            b_ch = modnum(b)
00279 !!$            c_ch = modnum(c)
